info.title: Contract Account
info.description:
Retrieve a list of contract accounts. Read contract account header and contract account-business partner relationship.

Retrieve the account balance for a contract account.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve contract accounts in Contract Accounting (FI-CA) from your SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Contract Accounting Master Data Integration(SAP_COM_0167)
[Contract Accounting - Master Data and Basic Functions(2AR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2AR " Link To BP ")
[Contract Accounting - Master Data and Basic Functions(OAR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/OAR " Link To BP ")
